title: Understanding labor value in first professional role
description: Understanding labor value in first professional role
content:
Scenario: Understanding labor value in first professional role
    Given Aisha is working her first full-time job
    And she's unsure if compensation is fair
    When the workplace_elohim analyzes her position
    Then it should provide market rate information
    And it should help her understand her labor's actual value
    And it should identify if compensation is equitable
    And the system should empower negotiation with information
    And she should learn to advocate for fair compensation
    And workplace care economy should make value transparent
